guidance.focus: Keep the camera steady and wait for focus
guidance.framing: Fill the frame with the plant matter

guidance.wholePlant: Capture the entire plant in frame with good lighting

diagnostics.description: Run these basic checks to help identify the issue:
diagnostics.ecInstructions: Measure nutrient strength (EC/TDS) to ensure proper feeding levels
diagnostics.lightInstructions: Check PPFD at canopy level to ensure adequate light without stress
diagnostics.pestInstructions: Check underside of leaves for spider mites, aphids, or other pests
diagnostics.phInstructions: Test pH level (soil: 6.0-7.0, hydro: 5.5-6.5) to rule out nutrient lockout
diagnostics.title: Diagnostic Checklist
diagnostics.wateringInstructions: Verify soil moisture level and watering schedule to rule out over/under-watering

aiTraining.impact: Off: diagnosis still works; no images added to training pool. Basis: consent; Retention: 365d
aiTraining.subtitle: Allow using your images to improve models
aiTraining.title: AI training images

analytics.impact: Off: playbook improvement analytics disabled. Basis: consent; Retention: 180d aggregated
analytics.infoBody: Anonymous usage of guided grow playbooks helps us refine schedules and AI recommendations.
analytics.subtitle: Help improve playbooks & AI suggestions
analytics.title: Guided grow analytics

crashDiagnostics.impact: Off: no crash reports are sent. Basis: consent; Retention: 180d
crashDiagnostics.subtitle: Send minimized crash reports
crashDiagnostics.title: Crash diagnostics

crashReporting.impact: Off: no crash diagnostics sent. Basis: consent; Retention: 90d aggregated
crashReporting.infoBody: Sending crash diagnostics helps us fix stability issues faster. We strip identifiers where possible.
crashReporting.subtitle: Send minimized crash diagnostics
crashReporting.title: Crash reporting

experiments.impact: Off: no A/B tests; feature rollouts disabled for you. Basis: consent
experiments.subtitle: Enable A/B tests and flags after consent
experiments.title: Experiments / feature flags

optOutError.message: Something went wrong withdrawing consent. Please try again.
optOutError.title: Opt-out failed

consent.optOutSubtitle: You can withdraw previously granted consent choices here.

optOutSuccess.message: We've disabled analytics and telemetry going forward.
optOutSuccess.title: All consents withdrawn

personalized.impact: Off: reports stay fully anonymous. Basis: consent; Retention: 30d
personalized.infoBody: Allows attaching pseudonymous IDs to improve error traceability. No direct personal data is stored.
personalized.subtitle: Include hashed identifiers in reports
personalized.title: Personalized diagnostics

quickOptOut.description: Withdraw all optional data collection consents instantly. Mandatory technical data is not collected.
quickOptOut.title: Quick opt-out

sessionReplay.impact: Off: no interaction replays. Basis: consent; Retention: 30d
sessionReplay.infoBody: Replay helps diagnose complex UI issues. Sensitive fields are masked where possible.
sessionReplay.subtitle: Allow anonymized interaction capture
sessionReplay.title: Session replay

telemetry.impact: Off: no usage analytics; performance metrics remain local. Basis: consent; Retention: 90d aggregated
telemetry.infoBody: Telemetry helps us understand feature usage and performance so we can improve reliability. We minimize and aggregate data.
telemetry.subtitle: Allow usage analytics after consent
telemetry.title: Telemetry / analytics

consent.title: Privacy choices

rationale.aiBelowThreshold: AI hypothesis below override threshold; retaining rule-based guidance.
rationale.ecAboveTarget: EC trend is above the reservoir target range.
rationale.ecBelowTarget: EC trend is below the reservoir target range.
rationale.phPersistentlyHigh: pH has remained above the reservoir target band.

recommendations.bufferAlkalinity: Add a buffer to neutralize source water alkalinity.
recommendations.diluteReservoir: Dilute the reservoir with balanced water to lower EC.
recommendations.increaseMonitoring: Increase pH/EC monitoring until readings stabilize.
recommendations.monitor48h: Retest after 48 hours to confirm recovery.
recommendations.nitrogenFeed: Increase nitrogen inputs according to the deficiency playbook.
recommendations.retest12h: Retest in 12 hours to verify corrections.

trichome.disclaimer: This guidance is educational, not professional advice. Always consider your specific growing conditions and preferences.

guide.amberDescription: Trichomes are amber/brown. More sedating, relaxing effects.
guide.clearDescription: Trichomes are transparent. Plant is not ready for harvest.
guide.milkyDescription: Trichomes are cloudy white. Peak potency and balanced effects.
guide.title: Trichome Development Guide

nudge.message: Based on your assessment, would you like to adjust harvest tasks by {{days}} days?

photography.focus: Focus on calyxes, not sugar leaves
photography.lighting: Use natural light or a jeweler's loupe with LED
photography.timing: Check multiple buds from different parts of the plant
photography.title: Photography Tips

recommendations.balanced: Harvest now for balanced effects (milky with some amber)
recommendations.energetic: Harvest now for energetic effects (mostly milky)
recommendations.sedating: Harvest now for sedating effects (significant amber)
recommendations.tooEarly: Wait longer - trichomes are mostly clear

trichome.subtitle: Determine optimal harvest timing
trichome.title: Trichome Check Helper
